summary: Comedy drama based on the true story of two British Army dentists who in 1942, eager to see action, go A.W.O.L. and invade occupied France on their own.
cast: Kenneth Cranham|Leo Bill|Anthony Valentine|James Fleet|Richard Sutton|Anthony O'Donnell|Glen Davies|Paul Bayfield|Jason Round|Julian Glover|Tim 'Nobby' Clarke|Nick Miles|Brian Bosley|Dickon Tolson|Nick Hussey|Nathan Stevenson|Tim McMullan|Barbara Massey|Rosanna Lavelle|Mossie Smith|Ian Lindsay|Sara Markland|Beth Cordingly|Derek Jacobi|Erich Redman|Phyllida Law|David Ryall|Sandra Reinton|Christopher Gudgeon|Stephan Grothgar|Jason Stammers|Richard Everett|Alan Thruston|Christopher Villiers|David Curtiz|Charles Oakden|Gary Bunn
title: Two Men Went to War
